name: Ocean Master Pro
description: The Ocean Master Pro is engineered for professional divers and ocean adventurers. With exceptional water resistance and luminous markers, this watch performs flawlessly in the deepest waters.

name: Urban Street Style
description: The Urban Street Style brings contemporary fashion to timekeeping. With its bold design and modern aesthetics, this watch is perfect for the style-conscious urbanite.

name: Skeleton Vision
description: The Skeleton Vision showcases the intricate beauty of mechanical watchmaking. With its transparent dial and exhibition case, you can admire the mesmerizing movement from every angle.

name: Field Commander
description: The Field Commander is built for tactical operations and outdoor expeditions. This rugged military-grade watch can withstand extreme conditions while maintaining precise timekeeping.

name: Rose Garden Elite
description: The Rose Garden Elite celebrates feminine elegance with floral-inspired design elements. This delicate timepiece features hand-painted rose details and sparkling accents.

name: Digital Pulse Pro
description: The Digital Pulse Pro combines cutting-edge fitness tracking with sleek smartwatch functionality. Monitor your health metrics in style with this advanced wearable technology.

name: Tourbillon Masterpiece
description: The Tourbillon Masterpiece represents the pinnacle of watchmaking artistry. This exceptional timepiece features a visible tourbillon mechanism and represents hundreds of hours of skilled craftsmanship.

name: Solar Explorer
description: The Solar Explorer harnesses the power of light to keep perfect time indefinitely. This eco-friendly timepiece never needs a battery change and features robust outdoor capabilities.

name: Bronze Diver Heritage
description: The Bronze Diver Heritage develops a unique patina over time, making each watch one-of-a-kind. This vintage-inspired dive watch combines old-world charm with modern diving specifications.

name: Perpetual Calendar Elite
description: The Perpetual Calendar Elite automatically adjusts for different month lengths and leap years until 2100. This sophisticated complication demonstrates the height of mechanical ingenuity.
features: Day, date, month, and year display
